basic_info.description: I am Tsay Yong, a video producer and content creator, currently based in Singapore. I ran a Gaming YouTube Channel, which I started in 2017, that to date has gained over 17,000 subscribers, 3,000,000 views and over 10,000,000 minutes of watch-time. My area of expertise lies with video editing, where I possess over 6 years of hands-on experience. I am well-versed in utilizing platforms like Sony Vegas Pro and Adobe After Effects, which are my primary tools for crafting captivating visuals. With exposure to a content writing internship, I have tons of experience dealing with digital media and know the key metrics that drive clicks and hold attention in a digital space.
basic_info.description_2: Having run a decently successful YouTube channel and substantial knowledge with software engineering, I am familiar with all sides of the coin when it comes to successful and effective digital marketing. With my recent experience covering media for the Singapore Army, I have the required understanding to edit your montages, wedding videos or movies - with added effects too!
basic_info.description_bold: I am excited to bring your visions and ideas to life.

projects.title: 99.co
projects.description: As a content writer, I wrote articles for 99.co regarding housing and development, to drive traffic to the 99.co site, as part of their Search Engine Optimization Effort.

projects.title: Binner
projects.description: A Minecraft YouTube channel that I started in 2017. My content started out being general Minecraft gigs, but eventually specialized into Hypixel Skyblock as the gamemode was attracting a lot of attention. To date, the channel has gained over 17,000 subscribers, 3,000,000 views and over 10,000,000 minutes of watchtime.

projects.title: Video Producer @ SAF
projects.description: I produced video content that documented the journey of NSFs completing their National Service in 2 SIR, as well as video highlights of key bilateral exercises between Singapore and its neighboring countries and Change of Command videos, which feature well wishes for commanders as a heartfelt farewell after their completion of their tour of duty.

experience.title: Video Producer
experience.description: Produced and directed highlight videos of military training in 2 SIR, as well as key bilateral exercises between Singapore and its neighboring countries; made Change of Command videos, featuring well wishes for unit and brigade commanders as a heartfelt farewell after completion of their tour of duty.
achievements: Awarded the Commanding Officer Coin for providing excellent video coverage for Exercise Maju Bersama, a military bilateral exercise between Singapore and Brunei.

Featured on the official Singapore Army social media (YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, etc) for Exercise SAFKAR Indopura, a bilateral exercise between Singapore and Indonesia. The various social media uploads are linked at top right corner.

experience.title: Binner - A Gaming Channel
experience.description: Ran a Minecraft Channel that focused on Hypixel Skyblock, an MMORPG built in Minecraft. This experience allowed me to gain insight into what it takes to be a successful social media influencer, as well as the key metrics that drives clicks and holds attention in a digital space. experience.title: Content Writer
achievements: Wrote articles for 99.co regarding housing and development, improving their site's SEO on Google
Helped staff with issues they had with their Python software
